channel.title: If I make my city walls out of crops
channel.description: ...does that mean any forced entry to the city is griefing and will result in a ban?

item.title: If I make my city walls out of crops
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:13, topic:400428”][quote author=PLayRooney link=topic=497503.msg3638768#msg3638768 date=1308798391]

You can destroy their entire wall as long as you replant ;D

Just kidding, but yea I think it was just a thread to try and find a flaw in the rule, Mopar.

Each Cane is a counts as a block meaning you if you break it you’l have to replant it and make it go from bedrock up again otherwise its greifing because minimal damage is only like 5-15 blocks but the sugar cane can go up to like 60-70 blocks
[/quote]
You’re all just looking for bullshit loopholes. Just get some obsidian houses and move on.[/quote]
I was trying to answer mitb question.

Read full topic
item.source: If I make my city walls out of crops

This thread makes absolutely no sense whatsoever, how would crops be different than any other block that ‘minimal greifing’ is allowed on?

item.title: If I make my city walls out of crops
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:5, topic:400428”][quote author=Travas link=topic=497503.msg3638034#msg3638034 date=1308736290]
Can’t they just make a tunnel underneath the crops and into your city?
[/quote]The crops could be grown from bedrock upwards.[quote author=Travas link=topic=497503.msg3638040#msg3638040 date=1308737771]
Also, if they wanted to be super secret about going into your town, they could always replant the crops on the way out.
[/quote]
They could, but if the crops they broke didn’t yield seeds they’d be screwed![/quote]Then they would harvest until they have enough seeds.

Read full topic

Can’t they just make a tunnel underneath the crops and into your city?[/quote]The crops could be grown from bedrock upwards.[quote=“Travas, post:4, topic:400428”]Also, if they wanted to be super secret about going into your town, they could always replant the crops on the way out.
